content.description: Debug a block (2017 Fall, Quest, Question 10)

p.line: You write a block to determine whether three values are all equal (when they are, it should return true, otherwise false). You test it and it's fine:
Which of the following statement is correct?
Your program might return true when it should return false, but when it returns false the real answer should be false.
Your program might return false when it should return true, but when it returns true the real answer should be true.
Your program might return true when it should return false, and could return false when should return true.
